title: The Voyage of Patience Goodspeed
description: While on a three-year voyage with her brother and whaling captain father in 1835, Patience Goodspeed finds herself bored with her role as cook's apprentice, but when a strange man sets sail with them, things take a turn for the worse and soon Patience must play captain in order to save the lives of those she loves.
author: Heather Vogel Frederick
